description: Try our easy to follow Caramelised Onion & Goat's Cheese Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Caramelised Onion & Goat's Cheese Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cream and horseradish in a serving bowl. Cut tart into pieces, serve with horseradish cream and rocket.
